word:
I can write no more now. Please copy this if you wish, or read it and send me the original direct to Santa Rosa, California. We leave here for California this week. The work of God is progressing here. It is now 


                                  -249- 

November 24. Last Sabbath nearly the entire church came forward for prayers. Every seat in the body of the house was filled and some of the side pews. I never saw a more interesting sight or felt more solemn sense of the power of God. -- Letter 1, 1873. 

Ellen G. White Estate Washington, D.C. November 7, 1985. Entire Letter.
